name: Snake for Watch
description:
Play the classic Snake game on your Apple Watch!

Snake for Watch is one of the first games for the Apple Watch (just like it was one of the first games on the PC in late 1970s). It uses an innovative way to create pixels and enable simple game playing on the Apple Watch.

You are a red snake, with an appetite for green dots. Each green delight makes you longer. Avoid the white dots, and don't bite your own tail! Use the arrow buttons to steer left or right.

Force touch (long tap) the Apple Watch screen to pause the game and choose to Resume or Restart.

Play the app on your Apple Watch, and use your iPhone to select the level and to submit your highscores to Game Center!
